reviews.review: gutes spiel ziemlich balanced mittlerweile allerdings niemals im Solo queue spielen das wäre reiner Suizid

Un jeu plein de qualités humaines, et toujours dans le respect de son prochain. Il n'y a rien de plus agréable que d'entendre la douceur des langues étrangères virevolter dans ses oreilles à l'instar du chant d'un rossignol au petit matin.

Un jeu plein de poésie et d'entraide. Plein de Rush B et de "Shut the fuck up" !

Une expérience inoubliable du bon gros FPS, je recommande ;)
Крутая игра, всем советую, классный геймплей

Game lacks any tutorial/introduction for new players to the genre or game itself and relies on good word and friends to grow it's playerbase. So rather than actual work being put into the development of the community, they just let the community to do all the actual work due to it being popular in the past. To end this rant, most of the challenges in the pass are not in any way fun, interesting or anything other than just grind to get.

You can have some awesome time playing  CS GO. Unfortunately 50% of the time you end up playing in a full russian or turkish team. Forget that they are trying to speak english with you. They probably could because they know all the calls but instead they abuse the audiochat for smalltalk. Discord or Teamspeak is unfamiliar to them. Unfortunately every 4 or 5 game you encounter some hackers or at least Global Elite Smurfs. This game could be so much better if the community wouldnt be such shit

This game is completely fun all over, different game modes, all kinds of fun with workshop mades, hide and seek and fun maps and gamemodes, and the main games like competitive is great and feels awesome when you wipe another team of Newbies.

Great team based shooter, defnetely improved my mechanical aim. Would recommend

Unless you want to spend a lot of time in a game having your fun ruined by hackers that are not being dealt with DO NOT PICK UP THIS GAME. This is just a playground for insecure man-children to test their ability to cheat their way to victory. It is unfair and seemingly unregulated. However, If your aim is to purely battle bots then by all means, game on. Do be aware of the janky, stupid AI. Even at the hardest difficulty they tend to just jump in place on some maps and never secure objectives.
Top Game, kann man nichts sagen.
